sentences: Itaalia köök tuntakse oma pastade ja veinide poolest.
context: The word 'itaalia' in Estonian is an adjective or noun referring to Italy or Italian culture/language. When used as an adjective, it describes something as being from Italy (e.g., 'itaalia vein' means Italian wine). As a noun, it can refer to the Italian language ('itaalia keel') or more generally to Italian things/people.
